name: Snake Game - Game
description: This is a Snake Game Made using basic stack's (HTML, CSS and JavaScript). This is my first project and I Loved building it . Where I learnt how to build a Gaming Engine to control screen refresh rate . Loved playing with also I had hosted it using GitHub Pages so u can also enjoy playing it. (Only desktop version of this game is present)
Learning: 1.] Learnt how to build a Gaming Engine
2.] Learnt how to control screen refresh rate

name: Tic Tac Toe - Game
description: This is a Tic Tac Toe Game Made using basic stack's (HTML, CSS and JavaScript). This is my Second project and I Loved building it . Loved playing with it , also I had hosted it using GitHub Pages so u can also enjoy playing it. (Both desktop and android version of this game is present)
Learning: 1.] Got more proficcient in the art of using CSS
2.] Learnt how to build JavaScript Logic

name: News Monkey
description: This is a News App , that keeps u updated with the latest news .I have used ReactJs and BootStrap in building this news-app . This is my Third project and it was great experience building this application , Where i learnt how to deal with API request(calls) and Asynchronous nature of JavaScript . This project is not been hosted as I have free version of NewsApi (i.e this webservice provides us with latest news in the form of json and it has two versions paid and unpaid . In unpaid version they are not allowing HTTPS request). 'You can see it on my github'
Learning: 1.] Learnt how to use CallBack in order to access Country component from another component .
2.] Learnt how to search for errors occured while building projects, if no one near helps u .
3.] Learnt API fetching using fetch and asynchronous nature of javascript.

name: Personal Website
description: This is my personal website , Which is built using ReactJs and BootStrap . I enjoyed building my own website , where I learnt how to use React-Spring (npm package for applying animation) , TypeWriter  and how to  host our works on the Domain . I faced various challanges while building my website but Resolved every issues that arised with great deligence and with learning attitude, this helped me a lot .
Learning: 1.] Learnt how to use React-Spring(an animation library) , TypeWriter and Timeline
2.] Learnt how to  Deploy to the Domain
3.] Learnt how to overcome challanges while working on the project

name: Weather App
description: This is a Weather App created using Node.js , HTML and CSS. Building this App was great Experience . Learnt how to fetch API by not using any npm package and also Asynchronous functionality of JavaScript . This App can show u the cureent temperature prediction of any place . Here I have used 2 API one for converting Location to Latitude and Longitude and Other one to find weather condition in that perticular longitude and latitude .
Learning: 2.] Cleared my Concept of Asynchronous Nature of JavaScript
3.] Learnt Error Handling while Fetching API's
